title: Aggregation
text: Adleria aggregates screens from different networks and present them uniformly.

title: Classification
text: Adleria classifies its screens with tags so that you can find the more suitable screens for your campaign.

title: Rating
text: Adleria performs an independent rating of every ad space, based on many relevant factors.

title: Approval
text: Super fast approval so that your campaigns can start almost immediately.

title: Streamlined operation
text: The advertisement process has been streamlined so that you can run your campaigns in a matter of a few clicks.

title: Powerful UI
text: You are in full control of your ads. Change the content, pause, add more screens, all at your fingertips.
